name: CodingExercises.Online
purpose: Static learning platform to practice data structures and algorithms via JupyterLite notebooks running entirely in the browser.
audience: People with programming experience and little math background learning DSA outside university.

tech.auth: Stubbed client-only auth (localStorage); can be replaced with Firebase later

routes./: Marketing home page describing platform and value
routes./foundations/algorithmic-techniques: Public article: fundamental ops, precomputation, iterative refinement
routes./curriculum/adts/[slug]: ADT detail page with overview, exercises (difficulty badges), related links, and login-gated notebook embed
routes./curriculum/techniques/[slug]: Technique detail with overview, exercises (difficulty badges), related links
routes./curriculum/tracks/[slug]: Track detail page mapping to ADTs, techniques, and case studies
routes./login: Sign-in form; stubbed auth; redirects back

auth.future: Swap with Firebase Auth SDK; keep context API surface

architecture.app: App Router wraps pages with AuthProvider and site chrome (Navbar/Footer)
architecture.protection: ADT pages and prior topic pages are wrapped with RequireAuth for notebook embedding
architecture.static: Configured output: export; images unoptimized for static hosting
architecture.config: JupyterLite base URL configurable via env
architecture.cms: File-based JSON CMS under src/content/cms for ADTs, Techniques, and Tracks with related links and exercises; registry.ts and tracks.ts load at build-time. ADTs grouped on index page with badges. Techniques index explains optimization of navigation/querying/computation.
